Shivah::

"Look out what are you saying, lady scout"replied Shivah "Kitkat is a 
high rank Predacon... Go ahead, ladies, I just liked to know that all 
it's ok" the male left the room.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Blaze looked back toward the Drakotron, "Yes I am a scientist." she 
replies

virus but
> kept being inturupted.
> 
> Silver Scout decides to give Shivah the answer it wanted, "Yes I'm 
a scout,
> I was doing what comes naturally when the Bitch (Forgive me Logo 
wherever
> you are) passed me. I was curious and decided to follow her." The 
mutant
> wasn't about to tell the annoyance that in actuality she was 
tracking Lady
> Hawk then decided to track Kit Kat instead.
> 
> "What's it take to get a quarentine around here?" Blaze thinks 
knowing that
> if the virus gets stronger in either herself or Silver Scout it may 
mutate
> into an airbornr virus. "If you'll excuse us I've got some work to 
do so
> PLEASE LEAVE." the tigress was beginning to be annoyed at the other
> Predacons thinking that thier immune to every thing on this planet, 
if the
> virus were to become active both of them were carriers and everyone 
who came
> in contact with them ran the risk of infection.
>
